about_the_game:
Escape From Exile is a immersive story survival game designed for you and your friends to enjoy. Set on an island that was once inhabited by an civilization, you find yourself stranded and faced with the challenge of survival. You will encounter hostile mobs that you must fight off while unraveling the secrets of the island.

Your ultimate goal is to uncover the truth behind what happened to this once inhabited land and find a way to communicated and get back to the mainland. To survive in this harsh environment, you'll need to build bases, farm, and explore to survive. The game offers a multiplayer experience for you and your friends to enjoy or a singleplayer mode.

Escape From Exile has an optional story mode but also a survival mode. You can choose to follow the immersive story or just try to survive the days and progress without it. The story is an tailored expierince with an ending, you can always convert it to an survival world to keep playing with the world you had without the story.

FAQ:

  • Can i suggest or talk about the game somewhere?
    Yes, The discord allows you to suggest features and report bugs with the bonus of some sneakpeaks!

  • How much does it cost?
    Escape From Exile is absolutely free to play!

  • When does the game release?
    There is no specific release date yet, as the development is being handled by a solo developer. However, the game is expected to launch it's demo at the end of summer, with the possibility of an early access version being available sooner.

  • How much content is there?
    Escape From Exile aims to provide a substantial amount of content for players to enjoy. While there is no fixed duration for the game, the developer is committed to creating a lengthy and immersive experience.

  • Can I play with my friends?
    Yes! Escape From Exile features has a multiplayer mode, allowing you to join forces with your friends and tackle the challenges together. Explore, survive, and unravel the island's mysteries as a team.

  • What is the gameplay like?
    Escape From Exile is a survival game set on an island where you find yourself stranded after a sailing mishap. Discover ancient runes and artifacts left behind by previous civilizations, uncovering their technology and history while facing the constant challenge of surviving hostile mobs and other creatures. Whether you choose to embark on this journey alone or with friends, the game offers a thrilling and immersive survival experience.

    Watch out and don't get yourself stuck on the island because maybe you will need to Escape From Exile! See you soon.
